name: Cosy Builder Wildlife (prototype)
description:
A very lacking prototype, it is missing:

  • Basic art
  • Balance
  • Animal interactions
  • Camera movement
  • Stacking tiles on top of another tile

Currently, I think this doesn't make sense as standalone software, sorry. 

The game is going to be like a mix of Dorfromantik and Islanders

------------

Greenlight Jam phases:

Ideation: https://josehzz.itch.io/greenlight-jam-idea

Development: https://josehzz.itch.io/cosy-builder-wildlife-development

Release: https://josehzz.itch.io/cosy-builder-wildlife-fake-release
